msbt.message: Oh! Hey, . I'm glad you came to visit I have something to say to you! Thanks, like, sooo much for giving me advice yesterday. It helped me decide to pack up! We'll be super far apart But I'll always remember and my très superstar friend.

Heeey, ! Thanks for all your advice yesterday! I've decided to move out, and I'm, like, low-key worried that everyone's going to suffer from deficiency But they've got you, don't they, ? You'll take good care of everyone!
THERE you are, ! Thanks for your advice yesterday. Kind of obvs, but I'm moving out!I owe you bunches, you know? I'm glad I got to see you one last time to say bye!

Hey, ! Thank glitter bombs you're here! I've decided to move off this island. Sorry to bolt, but I couldn't find the right time to tell you. So, anyhoo I'm packing to move. Thanks for kicking it with me! I'll never forget about you, !
Hey! Are you visiting?<10_4 /> Huh?! You live here?! We've never met before, right? Well, nice to meet you! My name's ! I know we just met, but I'm moving away todaySoawkward? But byyyyyyye!
! I decided to move away. So I won't be here next time you visit. I don't have ANY idea where I'm moving, so my next few days should be prrretty interesting
Move to my island!
Good luck!

Oh, hey there, . Nice timing! It's your last chance to say goodbye to me!This sparkle rocket is blasting off from , headed for the twin stars of fame and fortune!I don't have an exact landing spot in mind yet. But somewhere out there's an island that needs a pop star!When I find it, you'll know. You'll see the spotlights in the sky and hear the pyrotechnics!See you around, !For real, thoughI'm really glad I got to tell you bye, .
Hi, I'm !I'd say let's hang out, buuuut I'm heading out! Moving away!I haven't decided where to move, though, so I guess I should get back to figuring that out. Bye!
Thanks, ! I'm going to go wander the world and have some adventures! Everybody should travel, B-T-dubs. Meet folks, learn new stuff, eat great food you can't get at home!

! Check it out! I'm moving to beautiful ! I'm SO excited for my new life. I'm going to make sooo many new friends with my dazzling social skills!You should totally come for a visit once I'm settled in. You are SO welcome anytime!
I bet we'll see each other again! It's a big world, but there's only so much of it, right?
I'm SO excited I get to live on le same island as you again, ! I wonder what's changed since I lived there? Will I recognize anything Will I recognize ANYONE?!
Next time I see you, it'll be at ! I need the full tour, 'K?Show me concert venues, shops, restaurants, beaches, places to live I want to see it all!
I don't know if you've heard of this island I'm moving to It's called ! You should totes visit if you have the chance. For real! Anytime you want!
I should ditch a bunch of stuff to make the move easier, but I'm always sure I'll NEED what I threw out
I wonder what kind of friends I'll make on the new island I'm SO excited!
And so I set out in search of new lands, adventure, and maybelove.
I like, love this island. But I want to see the world! So, like, where should I go?
How about my island?
You'll figure it out!

Ummmduh? I've already been there. I lived there, remem— Or is that your point?!Show the NEW me to everyone who knew the OLD me And let them see how chic I am now!It's obvs fate that I ran into you, ! I'll go call Resident Services and ask!
Hmm's island Yeah. OK! I mean, if YOU'RE there, life will def be très GREAT! Alright! I'll check with your Resident Services and see if they have room for me!
Thanks. I'm def kind of rushing into things But WHATEVS! Sometimes it's fun to make it up as you go!
Hi. So. I just had a chat with the Resident Services folks on And they said I could move there! Watch out, ! Here comes !
Hey, ! So I hit 's Resident Services up for a chat And your island is WAY full. The person on the phone laughed when I asked if there was room! Maybe we should try some other time.

Hey. Thanks for waiting. So I asked 's Resident Services Your island's overbooked! It doesn't have any room for new houses. Well, not much point in moving there. Especially if I can't build my own place Maybe some other time.

Your island must be crazy popular to be completely out of room for new residents! Don't worry. I may not be able to live there, but I'll totes swing by on my world tour and say hi to you! With that many folks on your island, my shows will be PACKED! See you then, !
must be TRÈS popular if there's no more room to build.I'm kind of sad I couldn't move there too, but how great is it that you live on a super trendy island?
Think I should call Resident Services on again?
Yeah, go for it!
I dunno...
Ugh. You're right. It's probably not going to happen. Ah well, that's just how life is sometimes, !
